course_title: Adult/Gerontology Acute Care Nurse Practitioner III
course_description: This advanced population-focused diagnosis, treatment, and disease management course builds on prior knowledge of managing common acute/episodic and complex chronic health conditions and focuses on increasingly complex disease processes.
prerequisites: NRSG 604D prerequisite and NRSG 605D co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit. Students must enroll on NRSG 605D first.
sections: Class Nbr: 5264, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
